sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Grid, Tab, Label, Button,Table } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { format } from 'date-fns'; import local from 'date-fns/locale/fr'; import { IAffilie } from '../../../app/models/affilie'; import AffilieListItem from '../dashboard/AffilieListItem'; //import ReactPDF from '@react-pdf/renderer'; import { savePdf } from '../PDF/EtatQp' import { Document, Page, Text, View, StyleSheet} from '@react-pdf/renderer' const invisibleStyle = { display: 'none', }; const PdfQp: React.FC<{affilie: IAffilie }> = ({ affilie }) => { const borderColor = '#90e5fc' const styles = StyleSheet.create({ container: { flexDirection: 'row', borderBottomColor: '#bff0fd', backgroundColor: '#bff0fd', borderBottomWidth: 1, alignItems: 'center', height: 24, textAlign: 'center', fontStyle: 'bold', flexGrow: 1, }, description: { width: '60%', borderRightColor: borderColor, borderRightWidth: 1, }, qty: { width: '10%', borderRightColor: borderColor, borderRightWidth: 1, }, rate: { width: '15%', borderRightColor: borderColor, borderRightWidth: 1, }, amount: { width: '15%' }, }) ; return ( Item Description Qty @ Amount ); }; const AffilieDetailedInfo: React.FC<{ affilie: IAffilie }> = ({ affilie }) => { const panes = [ { menuItem: 'Dossiers PayÃ©s', render: () => N Dossier Date Paiement Fr Engage AMO MPSC TOTAL T.Dossier {affilie.Qps.map(qp => qp.observation !== 'Med' ? ( {qp.nDossier} {format(qp.datePaiementReel, 'EEEE d MMMM yyyy', { locale: local })} {qp.fraisEngage} {qp.rembAmo} {qp.rembMpsc} {qp.totalRemb} {qp.observation} ) : ( {qp.nDossier} {format(qp.datePaiementReel, 'EEEE d MMMM yyyy', { locale: local })} {qp.fraisEngage} {qp.rembAmo} {qp.rembMpsc} {qp.totalRemb} {qp.observation} ) )}
Total F.enTP (1) Rem.AMO TP Rem.MPSC TP Total.RemTP (2) Avance MPSC DIFF (1)-(2) {} {} {affilie.somFreEngageTP} Dhs {affilie.somRemCnopsTP} Dhs {affilie.somRemMpscTP} Dhs {affilie.somRemTP} Dhs {affilie.someAvanceMpsc} Dhs {Math.fround(parseFloat(affilie.somFreEngageTP.toString()) - parseFloat(affilie.somRemTP.toString())).toFixed(2)} Dhs {/**/} Total F.enDI (1) Rem.AMODI Rem.MPSCDI Total.RemDI (2) DIFF (1)-(2) {} {} {affilie.somFreEngage} Dhs {affilie.somRemCnops} Dhs {affilie.somRemMpsc} Dhs {affilie.somRem} Dhs {Math.fround(parseFloat(affilie.somFreEngage.toString()) - parseFloat(affilie.somRem.toString())).toFixed(2)} Dhs
}, { menuItem: 'Retenues', render: () => Id Pai Date Montant 303 304 Date.S T.Reception observation {affilie.QpMois.map(qpm => qpm.typePai === 'paiement manuel' ? ( {qpm.idPai} {format(qpm.date, 'EEEE d MMMM yyyy', { locale: local })} {qpm.qp} {qpm.code303} {qpm.code304} {format(qpm.dateSaisie, 'EEEE d MMMM yyyy', { locale: local })} {qpm.typePai} {qpm.observation} ) : ( {qpm.idPai} {format(qpm.date, 'EEEE d MMMM yyyy', { locale: local })} {qpm.qp} {qpm.code303} {qpm.code304} {format(qpm.dateSaisie, 'EEEE d MMMM yyyy', { locale: local })} {qpm.typePai} {qpm.observation} ) )}
Total Reliquat Reste {} {} {affilie.totalRetenues} Dhs {} {} {affilie.reliquat} Dhs {affilie.rest} Dhs
}, { menuItem: 'Immatriculation', render: () => N MAJ Date Type Maj userMaj info info1 {affilie.misAjours.map(Maj => Maj.rejetMajs.length > 0 ? Maj.rejetMajs.map(rej => rej.corrigeRejets.length > 0 ? (rej.corrigeRejets.map(corri => {Maj.id} {format(Maj.dateMaj, 'EEEE d MMMM yyyy', { locale: local })}

Rejetee Le : {format(rej.dateRejet, 'EEEE d MMMM yyyy', { locale: local })}

Corrigee Le : {format(corri.dateCorrige, 'EEEE d MMMM yyyy', { locale: local })} {Maj.typeMaj} {Maj.userMaj} {Maj.info}

Rejet Motif : {rej.motif} {Maj.infoIdentifiant} )) : {Maj.id} {format(Maj.dateMaj, 'EEEE d MMMM yyyy', { locale: local })}

Rejetee Le : {format(rej.dateRejet, 'EEEE d MMMM yyyy', { locale: local })} {Maj.typeMaj} {Maj.userMaj} {Maj.info}

Rejet Motif : {rej.motif} {Maj.infoIdentifiant} ) : {Maj.id} {format(Maj.dateMaj, 'EEEE d MMMM yyyy', { locale: local })}

 {Maj.typeMaj} {Maj.userMaj} {Maj.info} {Maj.infoIdentifiant} )}
}, ] return ( ); }; export default AffilieDetailedInfo;
